kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_1: Simple cobblestone generator, using a drill to harvest blocks
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_10: Just don't forget to wire everything up to spin the correct direction...
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_2: 2 sets of crushing wheels, crushing into gravel then into sand, clay balls, and flint
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_3: Wash sand to obtain more clay balls
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_4: Separate the byproduct flint from the clay output by filtering
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_5: Press the clay balls into clay blocks
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_6: Blast the clay blocks to obtain terracotta
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_7: Crush the terracotta to obtain red sand
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_8: Finally, wash the red sand to obtain golden nuggets
kubejs.ponder.scene_gold_farm.text_9: Behold: successful transmutation from mere stone into pure golden nuggets
kubejs.ponder.scene_iron_farm.text_1: Inventory slots all filled with at least 1 iron nugget/flint for a primitive filter
kubejs.ponder.scene_iron_farm.text_2: Fan to wash gravel into iron nuggets and flint
kubejs.ponder.scene_iron_farm.text_3: Adding more fans and increasing rotation speed will speed up processing
kubejs.ponder.scene_iron_farm.text_4: The main bottleneck in this farm is the millstone, grinding cobble into gravel
kubejs.ponder.scene_iron_farm.text_5: Simple cobblestone generator, using a drill to harvest blocks
kubejs.ponder.scene_iron_farm.text_6: This example is highly inefficient, but expandable for better rates
